quests.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, make an attempt to travel north. And then, move east. After that, attempt to move north. With that accomplished, attempt to take a trip north. And then, take a trip west. Then, make an effort to venture south. And then, make an attempt to venture west. After that, try to take a trip south. And then, travel south. And then, open the chest. Once that's all handled, you can stop!

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
Welcome to the garage.

 Were you looking for a chest? Because look over there, it's a chest.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_0]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] What a letdown! The chest is empty![end if] Look over there! a locker.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The locker is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a closet.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cellar. A normal one. Let's see what's in here.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You arrive in a study. A normal kind of place.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You are in a playroom. A standard one. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a cuboid safe.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The cuboid safe contains [a list of things in the c_2]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The cuboid safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You make out a mantle. You wonder idly who left that here. The mantle is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_0] On the mantle you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. What's the point of an empty mantle?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You arrive in a vault. A typical one.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You are in a scullery. A standard kind of place. You start to take note of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You're now in a cookhouse. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You can make out a freezer. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_3]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a safe.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_4]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the cookery.

 You can make out [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type 4 locker close by.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The type 4 locker contains [a list of things in the c_5], so there's that.[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The type 4 locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You see [if c_6 is locked]a locked[else if c_6 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] fridge.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_6]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The fridge is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can see a saucepan. [if there is something on the s_1]On the saucepan you see [a list of things on the s_1]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in the place we're calling the cubicle.

 You can see [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] trunk.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The trunk is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.desc:
You arrive in an attic. A normal kind of place.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You make another one of your grand eccentric entrances into a restroom.



There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You arrive in a basement. A typical kind of place.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so standard all of a sudden, it's because you've just shown up in the shower.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bar. A normal one. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You make out a bench. The bench is standard.[if there is something on the s_2] On the bench you can see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a spare room. A standard kind of place.

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a crate.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The crate is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You are in a canteen. An ordinary one. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
You are in a lounge. An ordinary one.

 You can make out [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] Microsoft style locker in the corner.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The Microsoft style locker contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] What a letdown! The Microsoft style locker is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

You've entered a kitchenette.



There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.desc:
You find yourself in a parlor. An ordinary kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

objective: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! First step, make an attempt to take a trip north. With that over with, go to the east. After that, go to the north. After that, make an attempt to take a trip north. With that accomplished, attempt to travel west. And then, make an effort to head south. With that over with, move west. If you can succeed at that, make an effort to travel south. And then, go to the south. Once you do that, open the chest. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
